ref: 11335 varjáyati1 ʻ removes, gives up ʼ ChUp., ʻ excludes ʼ Mn. [√vr̥j1]

lang: Language of `Kharoṣṭhī Inscriptions discovered by Sir Aurel Stein in Chinese Turkestan' edited by A. M. Boyer, E. J. Rapson, and E. Senart

ref: Pk. pp. vajjiya -- , pass. vajjijjaṁta -- ʻ being deserted ʼ;
Ku. bajyūṇo adj. ʻ to be got rid of, troublesome, accursed ʼ; O
Aw. bājaï ʻ stops ʼ (bāja ʻ without ʼ rather < bā́hya -- ).
